category.name: Project Level Security
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_show_all_user_projects
preference.preference_description: Controls whether the projects in which a user is a team member are displayed for selection in the Teamcenter interface or whether only the projects that correlate to the user's current group and role are displayed for selection. Valid values are: * true: Displays all the projects in which the user is a team member, regardless of the user's current group and role. This is the default value. * false: Displays only those projects in which the user is a team member based on the user's current group and role.
